title: De Soto Open Invitational
text: The De Soto Open Invitational was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="PGA%20Tour">PGA Tour</a> that was held from March 24–27, 1960 at the De Soto Lakes Golf & Country Club in <a href="Sarasota%2C%20Florida">Sarasota, Florida</a>. The club is now known as Palm-Aire Country Club and is located at Whitfield Avenue and Country Club Way. The event was won by then 47-year-old <a href="Sam%20Snead">Sam Snead</a>.
